name: Crisis Root
description:
This is a top view 2D action game. You play as a farmer living on an alien planet. The farm is now under attack by the evil creatures on this planet. These creatures try to kill all the plants you grow and take over your farm. Pick up your sickle and defend your farm!

Player movement: W, A, S, D

Attack: Spacebar

Skills: Q, E

Upgrade: Alpha.1, 2, 3, 4

Enjoy!

Developed by: Li Dong, Junjie Chen, Mingyu Zheng, Demi Li
